channel.title: [317][Godsword Emotes]Class30_Sub2_Sub3 problems
channel.description:
I was using a tut(SWAT's) to add GS Emotes. And I compiled after I finished, and got these three errors, and here is what my class30_sub2_sub3 looks like.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2mepg9e.jpg[/img]
I know what lines have errors in them, I just don't know how to fix them. I'll underline what ones have errors.
[code][U] if(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 == 1 && class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420 != null)[/U] Class36.method529(class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420, false); // loads the real file [U] if (class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1421 == 1044/*one of the last files*/){[/U] byte abyte0[] = class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420; //new //abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./cache/anims/74.dat"); //Class36.method529(abyte0, false); // loads ur extra custom file [U]}[/U][/code]
So if someone could help me to fix this then please say.

item.title: [317][Godsword Emotes]Class30_Sub2_Sub3 problems
item.dc:creator: @Sweet_Ride Sweet Ride
item.description:
@Sweet_Ride wrote:

I was using a tut(SWAT’s) to add GS Emotes. And I compiled after I finished, and got these three errors, and here is what my class30_sub2_sub3 looks like.

2mepg9e.jpg1024×614

I know what lines have errors in them, I just don’t know how to fix them. I’ll underline what ones have errors.

[U] if(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 == 1 && class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420 != null)[/U] Class36.method529(class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420, false); // loads the real file [U] if (class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1421 == 1044/*one of the last files*/){[/U] byte abyte0[] = class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420; //new //abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./cache/anims/74.dat"); //Class36.method529(abyte0, false); // loads ur extra custom file [U]}[/U]

So if someone could help me to fix this then please say.
